item.title: Welcome
item.description: .::NAME::. .::INFO::. Cloudflare DNS, Domain, Analytics, Security, Deployment Github Source Code Storage I’m using a heavily-modified version of XTerm, I’m just too lazy to make it into a unique theme. I’ve made several new additions as welL: Current Mood Photo + Text (pulled from a post’s TOML front matter) Currently Listening Spotify Song Embed (pulled from a post’s TOML front matter, based on SONG ID) Raw HTML Shortcode Insert raw HTML code into Markdown content
item.content:
.::NAME::. .::INFO::.
Cloudflare DNS, Domain, Analytics, Security, Deployment
Github Source Code Storage

I’m using a heavily-modified version of XTerm, I’m just too lazy to make it into a unique theme.

I’ve made several new additions as welL:


Current Mood

Photo + Text

(pulled from a post’s TOML front matter)


Currently Listening

Spotify Song Embed

(pulled from a post’s TOML front matter, based on SONG ID)


Raw HTML Shortcode

Insert raw HTML code into Markdown content


Plus a ton of other changes I really don’t feel like listing.

item.title: CV
item.description: Experience Redheads Studios July 2024 – Present Founder/CEO Austin, Texas Created Redheads, a creative development studio in Austin, Texas. Technologies: Go, HTML/CSS, C++, Python, and more! Freelancing 2012 – Present Full-Stack Dev San, Antonio + Austin, Texas Worked as a Freelance Dev for over a decade. Technologies: HTML/CSS, Ruby, Jekyll, Sass, etc. Education Self-Taught Aug 2012 - Present Self-Taught Motivation and Real-Life Experience San Antonio, Texas Technical Skills Languages: All, can learn anything given enough time
item.content:
Experience

Redheads Studios July 2024 – Present
Founder/CEO Austin, Texas
  • Created Redheads, a creative development studio in Austin, Texas.

Technologies: Go, HTML/CSS, C++, Python, and more!

Freelancing 2012 – Present
Full-Stack Dev San, Antonio + Austin, Texas
  • Worked as a Freelance Dev for over a decade.

Technologies: HTML/CSS, Ruby, Jekyll, Sass, etc.

Education

Self-Taught Aug 2012 - Present
Self-Taught Motivation and Real-Life Experience San Antonio, Texas

Technical Skills

Languages: All, can learn anything given enough time

Tools: Git, Notion, Discord, Pipedream, Sublime Text 3, iTerm2, will use anything honestly

Hobbies

Gaming, random projects, community organization, etc.
